title: How To Use Helium 10 To Find Keywords For KDP Low Content Books

tactics.name: Helium 10 X-ray Analysis
tactics.description: Use Helium 10's X-ray tool to analyze competitor products and extract keywords for KDP low content books.
steps: Install Helium 10 Chrome extension and sign in
Use X-ray tool to research Amazon products
Analyze BSR, price, reviews, and ACIN data
caveats: Free version limits async requests to 2/day
source_quotes: it gives you the total revenue for that particular keyword all those products the average revenue the average bsr the average price the average reviews

tactics.name: Bulk Keyword Search with Helium 10
tactics.description: Use Helium 10's bulk search feature to identify high-volume, low-competition keywords for KDP books.
steps: Log into Helium 10 and run multiple keyword searches simultaneously.
Filter results by search volume (minimum 100) and competition (under 1,000).
Exclude trademarked terms using the 'exclude' feature.
Analyze organic rank and cerebral score for keyword relevance.
caveats: Verify trademarks via Helium 10's trademark database
source_quotes: we want a search volume of a minimum of a hundred and then we can also go to advanced searches and we don't want to see any competing products of more than a thousand

tactics.name: Keyword Niche Subdivision
tactics.description: Identify specific niches within broad categories by combining different tracking aspects like calories, carbs, or fasting.
steps: Filter keywords by competition and search volume
Adjust thresholds for minimum search volume and competing products
Create sub-niches based on tracking goals
caveats: Requires manual adjustment of filters for optimal results
source_quotes: you can niche frost niche sub niche niche write down all the different ways

tactics.name: Competitor Product Analysis
tactics.description: Evaluate competing products to identify gaps and opportunities for unique keyword targeting.
steps: Check competing products for keyword variations
Look for untapped niches like undated calendars
Combine keywords with specific tracking goals
caveats: May require additional market research for validation
source_quotes: you could put an undated calendar or diary in there

heuristics.name: Low Review Boost
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are less than 200, prioritize keywords
source_quotes: we can actually see now so the beauty of using helium 10 is one of the tools that we're going to look at today

heuristics.name: Competitor Threshold Rule
heuristics.condition: If competition is less than 1,000, prioritize keywords
source_quotes: we don't want to see any competing products of more than a thousand

claims.statement: KDP low content books cannot compete with hardcover books on Amazon
source_quotes: we can't do hardback as of yet nor can we do like this moleskin look

claims.statement: New KDP books can achieve high cerebral scores and search volumes
source_quotes: it is a new book because this came out 30th of december of 2020 and then there's 69 sponsored keywords again is recommending different books that frequently brought together and that's the one we've just had a look at again word frequency so we've got 655 words to go through again there's a lot of competition on some of these five thousand three thousand five six that one's not got a lot and it's also got a high cerebral score…

claims.statement: Helium 10 can be used for KDP keyword research, though compatibility with KDP is still being tested.
source_quotes: i don't know if you can use with keto er keita with kdp yet

niche_patterns.description: Target specific demographics with niche constraints for low-content book sales
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Leverages evergreen niches with seasonal search volume fluctuations
source_quotes: weight loss is an evergreen product it has peaks and troughs
